name: The Dark Side of Web3 & Building Momentum with Toby Lasso of Nocturnal | OBI #3
metadata:
{"name": "The Dark Side of Web3 & Building Momentum with Toby Lasso of Nocturnal | OBI #3 1/15", "description": "One Big Idea Podcast Episode 3

Each week I bring on the brightest creators, builders, and thought leaders to explore the intersection of crypto and culture.  In this week's episode, I sit with Toby Lasso, the co-founder of Web3 artist management company Nocturnal. 

We discuss:

-Toby's entry to Web3 and the early days of Cool Cats

-Managing Vinnie Hager and partnering on Letters, the artist's genesis NFT collection

-Weather Report Controversy and its Aftermath

-Building a Web3-Focused Management Company During the Bear Market

I am grateful to Toby for being open to sharing some of his more challenging moments from the past year. If youb�re thinking about suicide, are worried about a friend or loved one, or would like emotional support, the Lifeline network is available 24/7 across the United States. Text SHOUT to 988 or visit https://988lifeline.org/.
